meanings.definition: The SI unit of solid angle, equal to the angle subtended at the center of a sphere by an area on the surface of the sphere equal to the square of the radius.
meanings.sent1: A steradian measures how much space an object takes up from the center of a sphere.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use steradians to calculate the spread of light in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The steradian decided to throw a party for all the other units of measurement.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a steradian of joy, spreading happiness everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a steradian can be visualized as a slice of pizza, where the angle determines the size of the slice.
